game.name: DCS: F4U-1D Corsair
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: This module includes an F4U-1D Corsair aircraft, Essex class aircraft carrier and 8 WWII Imperial Japanese ground units.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This module includes an F4U-1D Corsair aircraft, Essex class aircraft carrier and 8 WWII Imperial Japanese ground units.
